task.title: Configure the ORB pass by reference

titlealts.searchtitle: Configure the ORB pass by reference

task.shortdesc: Configure the ORB pass by reference

step.cmd: Navigate to ServersServer TypesWebSphere application servers.
Select the relevant server from the list, e.g. server1.
In the Container Settings section expand Container Services and Select the ORB service link.
Select the Pass by reference option from the General Properties section.
Save the changes made to the master configuration.
